tweets.text: @Charlie_Bil @EnvAgencySE De silting is only removing the soft silt on the river bed, dredging is removing soft silt along with river bed to create a bigger depth, which is harmful to a river structure

@oxfordroly Thank you for taking note and alerting us. Could you report this to our 24/7 incident hotline 0800 807060 which may ask for more info (odour, wildlife etc) before it alerts a duty officer?
@DeTom48 @EnvAgencySE Isn‚Äôt that the same thing? They use to dredge the Thames and most of that was silt (apart from when they hit rubble) and they called IR dredging?

8 Goosander feeding on the river Severn at Northwick, Worcester this afternoon. Made up of 2 female & 6 juv. Treecreeper. Drumming GSWP. Stonechat pair showed well by the marsh but unfortunately dead Swan also near path. Reported to ‚Å¶@EnvAgency‚Å© & ‚Å¶‚Å¶@myworcester‚Å© https://t.co/4N6PhyefkC

New dredging starts Thursday 14 January, so River Parrett can carry more flood water. Follows successful water injection dredging trial last January @IDBsomerset @TeamVanOord. Thanks @HeartofSWLEP #GrowthDeals funding + help from @EnvAgencySW @NESouthWest 
https://t.co/ZbvjppofkT

urls.title: Planners give green light to Otter Valley project
urls.description: A project to help a river valley adapt to climate change and create an internationally important wildlife reserve now has planning permission.

tweets.text:
Our plan to restore the floodplain of the lower River Otter on England‚Äôs Jurassic Coast has been approved by @eastdevon.

Work will start soon to help the valley adapt to climate change and create an internationally important wildlife reserve.

Read more: https://t.co/IrOjgPdF1f

We've installed state-of-the-art equipment at our #Scunthorpe site to transform the way we monitor the water network. At ¬£800,000, it's a significant investment that's been welcomed by @EnvAgency. Find out more...
https://t.co/nQ8PW2fAOz https://t.co/EZtQgu88IS

This is a huge result for #ClimateAdaptation. The River Otter has been trying to reconnect with its flood plain since 1812. This is partnered with a similar project in the Sa√¢ne Valley in France. If successful the model will be rolled out further. #RacetoResilience #adaptourworld https://t.co/LWKN3wdVG6
